screens.title: What you can do in Services
screens.content: Here you can view a list of national and local services available in the app. Press on a service name to check its details. From the service detail page, you can also manage the settings for push notifications and message forwarding to your email address.

faqs.title: How can I change the settings of each service?
faqs.body:
For each service, you can decide if you want to receive in-app messages and push notifications. At Profile > Preferences > Email Message Forwarding you can also enable message forwarding of all active services to your email address.
 
Even if you see the full list of services, you’ll be contacted only by  institutions that know your Fiscal Code and have a communication that concerns you directly.

faqs.title: Can I contact institutions through IO?
faqs.body: No, you cannot directly contact institutions through the app. If you need to contact an institution, you can do so through the contacts detailed in each service detail page.

screens.title: Service detail
screens.content:
Here you can find the service description, privacy policy and terms of use, and contact details of the institution or service. You can also choose how this specific service can contact you.
 
You’ll be contacted only by institutions that have a communication that concerns you directly. You will not receive spam messages or any information that is not relevant to you.
 
 If you do not want to receive communications from the service, disable the 'Contact you in app' option from the 'This service may' area. The institution will no longer write to you through IO, but it can still contact you through other channels, such as by email, phone, or mail.

faqs.title: What happens if I turn off a service?
faqs.body: You will no longer receive communications from that service in the IO app. The institution providing the service may still contact you or be contacted through other channels such as website, email or phone number.

faqs.title: What are push notifications and how do they work?
faqs.body: Push notifications are instant messages that you can receive on your device. They inform you that a new message has arrived in the IO app and invite you to read it. If you prefer to turn them off, disable the 'Send you push notifications' option in the 'This service may' area.

faqs.title: How does email forwarding of messages work?
faqs.body:
By enabling email forwarding of messages, you will receive a copy of the message you receive on IO to your email address associated with the app.
 
 Email forwarding is not available for some services, as the institution may decide not to forward messages with sensitive content.

screens.title: Donations Ukraine
screens.content: In this page, you can make a donation to charities assisting the civilian victims of the crisis in Ukraine.

faqs.title: How can I make a donation?
faqs.body: To donate, choose a charity from the list. Then select the amount you want to donate and press 'Continue'. Use a supported payment method or select it from your Wallet. Finally, press 'Pay' to complete the donation.

faqs.title: What payment methods can I use to make the donation?
faqs.body: You can donate with credit, debit or prepaid card and with PayPal.

faqs.title: Is there a minimum amount?
faqs.body: Yes, you can donate from a minimum of €5 to a maximum of €200. If you want to donate higher amounts, you can repeat the donation.

faqs.title: Is there a commission cost associated with the donation?
faqs.body: If you donate with credit, debit or prepaid card, no commissions are charged.

faqs.title: After donating, I did not receive the email with the receipt. What can I do?
faqs.body: If you donate through an Android device, you will receive an email with the receipt. If you don't, check your spam folder and make sure the address you find under Profile > Your Information is correct. We recommend that you keep your receipt, along with original documentation of the payment (such as the bank or credit card statement) for tax purposes.

faqs.title: I represent a charity: can I participate in the initiative?
faqs.body: For information on how to participate in the initiative, email affari.istituzionali@pagopa.it.
